title: Handle a Bereavement Leave Request
description: An employee needs to take time off following the death of a family member.

tasks.description: Receive the employee's request for bereavement leave.
tasks.expected_outcome: HR representative receives the request with empathy and professionalism.

tasks.description: Explain the company's bereavement leave policy (e.g., number of paid days off).
tasks.expected_outcome: Rep clearly communicates the policy, stating the employee is entitled to 3 paid days.

tasks.description: Record the bereavement leave in the time and attendance system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Rep correctly logs the time off in the HRIS.
